DGCG algorithm 0.0.1 documentation

src.log_mod

Contents

src.log_mod¶

Logger class module

Undocumented. It should be replaced by a proper logging method that uses native python’s logging module.

If the logging is too obnoxious, it is always possible to delete all calls to the logger in the solver and the solver should works just fine.
